xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 2.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Kusalattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
202.
694Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe saṃsaṭṭho eko khandho, dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (1)
695Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe saṃsaṭṭho eko khandho, dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (1)
696Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe saṃsaṭṭho eko khandho, dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe saṃsaṭṭho eko khandho, dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. (1)
